details.history: The dungeon was created by drow elves as a stronghold. It was eventually abandoned due to plague, and has been attacked and abandoned many times since then.

settings.name: The Dread Hive of Kas the Betrayer

wandering_monsters.1: Fire Giant (cr 9, mm 154) and 1 x Red Dragon Wyrmling (cr 4, mm 98); hard, 6100 xp, consumed by disease and madness
wandering_monsters.2: 15 x Hobgoblin (cr 1/2, mm 186) and 1 x Bugbear (cr 1, mm 33); hard, 1700 xp, scavenging for food and treasure
wandering_monsters.3: 13 x Hobgoblin (cr 1/2, mm 186); easy, 1300 xp, hunting for food
wandering_monsters.4: Orc Eye of Gruumsh (cr 2, mm 247) and 12 x Orc (cr 1/2, mm 246); medium, 1650 xp, returning to their lair with plunder
wandering_monsters.5: Hobgoblin Devastator (cr 4, motm 153, vgm 161) and 3 x Hobgoblin (cr 1/2, mm 186); easy, 1400 xp, trying to lure the party into an ambush
wandering_monsters.6: Fire Giant (cr 9, mm 154); medium, 5000 xp, wielding bizarre eldritch powers
